pros: Two pull loops make these easy to slide into
Though they're not as stylish as some of Dr. Martens' other styles, these don't take as long to break in and have padded ankles for extra protection
cons: Some customers found the opening too snug

customer_reviews.title: Not the Made In England Docs.
customer_reviews.text: The add is fairly misleading, I got the made in china ones that don’t last. Although the add dosnt say specifically that these are made in England, It eludes to it. Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Dan Druff

customer_reviews.title: Knock offs buy the real ones
customer_reviews.text: I just got these boots in. I have bought at least 6 pairs of these boots over the years. I noticed some obvious things wrong. No liner in boot, lable is different and sewed wrong, logos are slightly different. I have two old pairs I keep for yard work so I compared. These are knock offs. Dr. Martens are always tight to start and tight around the ankle. Once they break in the are very comfortable. I do recommend using water proofing and toe gaurd. Any steel toe boots will wear on the toes and also will rub on your big toe.
customer_reviews.author: vegaswolf316

customer_reviews.title: Wet Feet aren’t Good, Now What Do I do?
customer_reviews.text: Loved these boots April-October. The extra side padding has saved my ankles several times. But last night was the first real snow storm. A brief walk through 2-3” of snow mud water and my right toe got wet. No visible cracks holes or other damage to the boots. Just a few normal scratches on the leather toes and normal wear on the soles. Every two months I have cleaned and heavily oiled these boots with Huberd’s Shoe Grease to keep the. Soft and Sealed. I deliver frac sand in No-Colorado and spend a majority of time nin my truck, not out in the weather. Wet feet aren’t good. Now what do I do?
customer_reviews.author: LS Clark

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend above other work boots.
customer_reviews.text: I have long since been a fan of Dr.Martens. I rocked them when I was younger during my teenage angst phase, and later in life when I wanted to look a bit snappy. As for work boots, I can say that I am equally impressed. As I said, I have always liked Dr.Martens. I work as a senior engineer on the mechanical engineering team at a data center, and I have worn many, many types of work boots. Cat and Timberlands to name a few. These, by far, take the cake. Easy to slip on, a firm, but supportive hold, and easy to wear around all day. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AlexBaconFit

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE SOLES
customer_reviews.text: Im a cook and im on my feet 10 or so hours at a time 5 days a week. After 2 months of normal work wear this " industrial" boots sole cracked completely in half on both boots. Now water leaks through them all the time. I had my Justin work boots for a year and they were just fine. This is why Dr Martens has lost its popularity. I spent hard earned money on these boots and they didnt last even 6 months. I really liked them at first so this was a real bummer. Maybe one day they'll wise up before they go out of business but I dont think they care one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Henry <3

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Pair, Last Pair Lasted 2 Years!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had bought this exact style 2 years ago at a store. He has wore them almost every day for the past 2 years, he is a mechanic and is on his feet all day. He has tried many brands but, when these finally blew out, he had me hunt for another pair exactly like the ones he had. He has some boots that lasted a few months, most would last a year but, these lasted 2 years for him! Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: MommaGray

customer_reviews.title: Good work boots!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big diy/yard person and we live in an area with lots of critters that bite/sting eyc. Our yard also sprouts rocks :) So, these are easy on easy off, keep me from breaking my toes and ankles, help keep me sure footed around small construction projects and are waterproof which is important because it rains every day. They’re comfortable to wear for hours at a time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Justeliisfine

customer_reviews.title: They were good until I bought real boots
customer_reviews.text: Original review after a few months: Steel toe is good, no, great! the ankle protection is a nice touch and I use it! The leather is durable and comfortable Downsides: The soles wear quickly! Heavy all in all, not a bad entry level boot, fitment was like a tennis shoe, in other boots I wear a 9-9.5us, but im a 10 in DM Review after wearing catipillar boots: The Doc's felt good out of the box, but the sole wore out IMMEDIATELY, making traction poor, the soles are very heavy and the boots stretched out considerably after running very small. My Cat's are twice as comfortable and indefinitely more durable
customer_reviews.author: that one guy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of toe room, loose at the calve.
customer_reviews.text: They are a little loose as compared to the same size Doc Martines steel toe laced boot, which was a little expected. Otherwise the boot would not slip on. There is a lot more toe room as well. It feels like a regular Doc Martines steel toe laced boot with the top laces loose and more toe room. I have somewhat small calves and flat feet, so that might be my issue. I still wear them, but my feet may not take a long day of walking with these.
customer_reviews.author: pyrocotton

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and the fit. Super comfortable. I wear a women’s eight, but they were out of the ‘woman’s’ icon (I honestly do t think there is a single difference except size identification) so I got a men’s seven. They are definitely to big, maybe could have done a men’s 6 instead. But I’d rather have roomier than to tight. And I can definitely double up the winter socks w no problem. Over all I am completely happy so far. Gotta give them more time in the field before I make my final opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Poor exciuse for work boots
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these boots a total of 22 days. I walk a lot but the first thing I noticed was the narrow circular top. You must have skinny calf's to get these on. I have sores on both shins from rubbing. The protective toe in the left boot is out of place and wears on my toes. The soles have already started bad wear patterns. I am extremely disappointed. my recommendation is buy something else
customer_reviews.author: mother of two

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Toe Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as a gift for work and he was excited to wear them. He cannot wear them for very long before the pain sets in though. The toe box is too narrow and the he can feel the metal box squeeze his toes causing blisters. He is a size 12 with average width but I got him extra wide so he would have plenty of room and his toes wouldn’t be squished, but that didn’t end up helping. I will be searching for a new brand of boots that can give him comfort and support.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: These did seem like nice boots though of good quality
customer_reviews.text: Boots and original box sticker had the same size printed on both of them (what the boots really were). For some reason someone in the warehouse somewhere put a different size sticker on the box next to the original one that they must've picked the boots by. The sticker new sticker had the size I wanted however it didn't magically make the boots grow 2 sizes. Needless to say I couldn't even get the boots on my feet. Sent them back for a different brand. These did seem like nice boots though of good quality. Maybe I'll try again in a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Toe Area is Cramped
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very durable. They survive walking through a number of wet conditions, including acidic fluids and liquid chlorine. The toe area is a bit cramped, but that always seems to be a risk with steel toe boots. Even broken in, I'd be hesitant to wear them for more than 8 to 10 hours if you're on your feet the whole day. This is the second pair I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Scheffler

customer_reviews.title: Best boots and buying experience
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have giant feet, and finding boots is tough. Not only did theh have my size, they had a great selection of colors! Boots got here a day early and are in perfect condition! These boots fit great too, snug in the arch an plenty of room in the toes!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Boots have been my choice for daily footwear for... Too many years. I had never owned a pair from this company before and went into these expecting them to last me a long time. At work I average about 15,000 steps a day, mind you I work in a large retail store with polished concrete floors. On my days off I do yard work, house work, vehicle maintenance / mechanical work. I expect my boots to be able to handle anything and everything. These boots fell apart after about 6 months. For the price and the brand I expected better. I will stick to more trusted brands from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Really practice boots
customer_reviews.text: I am in the construction industry, and walk job sites all day. I have owned Doc's in the past and have always been very pleased with them, so I purchased these. These boots are really a great pair of boots! I wear a 10.5 normal width, and so I bought the 11. There is plenty of room in them and in the winter, I should be able to wear my wool socks to keep my feet warm. I have worn these boots out on nights on the town, and love the distressed look of them. These are cool boots and very practice, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these with the traditional translucent brown Doc sole several years ago and they were great. I needed a slip off pair of shoes and they came to mind. So I shopped around and found the best deal was on Amazon. The new boots came with a black sole which I actually like a lot better. They fit as expected and seem to be better quality than standard Doc Martin boots.
customer_reviews.author: J Mc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Boots!!! (but US conversion runs small)
customer_reviews.text: For me, the US size conversion ran a size to small, I am US 13 in everything, but I had to return and get the UK 13/US 14. That said, they are amazing!!! They look great, they are super comfortable, and just so well made. These will last a lifetime. So happy with the purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fredstrong

customer_reviews.title: Padded in the right spots
customer_reviews.text: I use these when riding my bike. Padded around the ankles which rocks since you usually bump those. Handles scuffing well and comfortable enough sole to wear for extended periods of time. Looks cool as well. Brown is really dark though so the picture does not do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, durable boot for the cost!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots. He was in desperate need of a good work boot that would prevent sharp, harmful debris from penetrating the sole, and boots that would be light enough to wear during the summer. The boots are breathable, and durable. My husband is primarily using them for everything he does around the house for maintenance and landscaping. They were true to size and he is happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cripps

customer_reviews.title: This is an extremely comfortable boot!
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely comfortable boot!! I initially orders a size 10 in the 2296 and it was a very narrow boot. I contacted the seller of this boot to see if these were wider because I went to the Dr. Marten store in Seattle and they only sold them in extra wide. I decided to order these boots in a size larger then my normal shoe size because I have a Red Wing insole. To sum things up, these are the most comfortable work boots I have ever purchased in my life and they are $30 less then what you will pay the Dr. Marten store.
customer_reviews.author: BornLippy88

customer_reviews.title: ... these boots hold up only time will tell there nice quality I'm just worried about the soles going out ...
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for now hope these boots hold up only time will tell there nice quality I'm just worried about the soles going out like other reviews have said I won't be wearing these to work more hunting and out door boots for me I condition the leather with mink oil will update if any problems
customer_reviews.author: Michaelwhittman

customer_reviews.title: Top quality boots.  I end up back here evry
customer_reviews.text: I wear work boots every day. I have tried several more expensive brands/styles and always end up back at these Docs. Lightweight and comfortable out of the box. My only complaint is i have to waterproof them myself (water well driller, i stay wet all day). Darn good boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good boots! US mens sizing
customer_reviews.text: These are offered in US mens sizes here. I ordered a size too big, so I can wear thick socks, and not feel the toe box. I feared until delivery that they were actually sold here in UK size, which would have meant me getting boots 2 sizes too big, which thankfully, was not the case!
customer_reviews.author: Jelly

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these boots without any issue. They lasted over 2 years of daily wear at work. This pair is falling apart after just month and a half. Really disappointed. Sole is separating from the boot.
customer_reviews.author: greg johnson

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 size too small.  Decent boots otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Decent construction. Made in China. About a 1/2 size too small. Returned and ordered a size up. Updated- next size up is perfect. As I thought these are 1/2 size smaller than the American size . The 13 I ordered fit like a 12.5. The 14 are big enough to wear thick socks with. Comfortable with a decent Doc tread.
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Weasel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boot
customer_reviews.text: After wearing for over a week, these are very nice boots. Although not waterproof, and I did not expect them to be, they seem to dry out fast. They fit tight at first and seem to run small, but after a week break-in, they are perfect. I also have very wide feet so I don't blame the tight fit on the boots. They seem very well built for China and what they cost. Overall, very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: TonyD

customer_reviews.title: Size and insole
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the boots but I have a high arch and I need to get a bigger size because they do run the true size so I would need enough room for an in sole. Excellent customer service. Will return and purchase another Dr. Martin s pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Galindo

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: The combines the worst things about Dr. Martens and the worst things about slip on boots. The sole is super squishy, so they’re halfway comfortable but they’re definitely not great at supporting your foot. You feel everything you step on. The leather is greasy and thin but does a decent job of resisting scuffs. The boot is really wide and doesn’t support my foot well. I wouldn’t recommend for and kind of hard use.
customer_reviews.author: R. M.

customer_reviews.title: Have to say
customer_reviews.text: I've had dozens of pairs of Doc Martens and these are just as good quality as any of the other pairs I have purchased. And like any other leather shoe or boot you must break them in for a while. I have walked about six or seven miles a day in these for a week, and I'd say they are broken in finally. They are very well made, they are very tough, and I will buy another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Alex McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: great boot, not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: size runs small and way too narrow for "wide fit". i sent back and went up a size. wish they had half sizes. i love the boots themselves, just wish they were wider. a lot widers. too tight on the top of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Love these work boots
customer_reviews.text: Six months in, and no complaints. Good traction in the rain, great ankle protection and so far so good with the insoles. Will probably change it out later, but as of now.. still very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfan808

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and comfortable, though my feet get fatigued after a while
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and comfortable, though my feet get fatigued after a while. 4 stars bc my socks keep slipping down without the cinched shoe lace to hold them in place. Slip on is very convenient and quick though!
customer_reviews.author: Coral S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with a high instep.
customer_reviews.text: I love Docs, I've got several pairs, and was very disappointed in these. I had to return them. I have a high instep and couldn't even begin to get my foot into them. I was very sad not to keep them because they look awesome and I was looking forward to making them one of my main pairs of Docs, like my for-lifes.
customer_reviews.author: seattlewhovian

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality / Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THESE BOOTS.... If you need a pair of boots that you'll wear to work every day these are not the boots for you. My husband started wearing them in January and they're already so worn out that he has had to purchase a new pair of boots. He is a field mechanic so the boots got a fair amount of dirt, oil, and mud; however these boots didn't even last him 6 months. The soles cracked and the upper leather is torn and split. Extremely unhappy with the quality and durability of these boots. We will not be purchasing another pair of Dr. Martens in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: J Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I work in a harsh environment and I'm lucky if I get 4 to 6 months out of my boots; I'm pretty hard on them. I bought a pair of these boots and couldn't believe I got 2 years out of them. Just bought another pair and they arrived on time and fit just as described. There is a break in period but for the money these are the best boots!
customer_reviews.author: James G

customer_reviews.title: The only reason these did not get 5 stars is ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason these did not get 5 stars is that they were made in China. That said, the last pair I bought lasted me 3 years and I still have them but need to repair a gash on them. I put them through a lot and they did really well. I will say you should polish them at least once a year, especially if you have snowy winters.
customer_reviews.author: P.Vas

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: These are fake. Made in China. Not made in England.
customer_reviews.author: HersheySquirts22

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable - no laces to mess with.
customer_reviews.text: Having bought my fist Doc Martens in the early 90's (which I still use while riding my motorcycle) I was pleasantly surprised when my son loved the boots I ordered him for Christmas. The most comfortable boots... love them.... great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Quality Boot, Tight Fit, Poor QC
customer_reviews.text: For those that aren't familiar with "Black", it fades to dark brown relatively quickly with regular wear. Boot is tight and needs breaking in, which was to be expected, however when I went to check box for potential helpful information from company for breaking in of said boots. I found that these were returned previously for being too small in the right boot...I just hope you took care of that particular gentleman in Luther, Michigan. His personal information (while the note should not have been written on back of a financial statement) did not need to make it to South Carolina.
customer_reviews.author: Crayton Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair that aren't steel toe that I love, that's what prompted me to get these. They are awesome for 90% of what I do. The only place they are lacking is there isn't a shank that runs length wise, so my feet hurt some after working on a ladder. Still giving 5 stars because I should have realized since there isn't a mention of a shank and I have a brother pair without shank also.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Walter

customer_reviews.title: Need a good pair of boots for 1 month, here you go.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these back in early May and wore these boots for a little over a month and they were fine but 2 months in and I'm still wearing my old pair of boots because they support my feet, I bought the old pair over 2 years ago. I remember the 2nd week I got the Dr Martin's , the bottom was melting to the ground. It wasn't even warm outside yet.. I would have been better off saving my money. They boot isn't totally bad but I won't work an hour day in them for over a month
customer_reviews.author: The name K

customer_reviews.title: A great quality shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes for work. He works on the floor of a plant and wears these almost every day for work and home. Wearing them almost every day, they last about a year. He says they are very comfortable. I can hardly get him to wear anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Anna L

customer_reviews.title: More for show than actually for work
customer_reviews.text: I like that they dont break apart easy but the straps start to come lose and the steel toe starts to give you casises after a while worked them pretty hard besides that good boots but probably better buying composite toe if it's really cold the ankle support on the side helps a little but not much
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for riding my motorcycle. They look great and work great. My jeans don't fold up while riding fast. They seem pretty durable and I'm sure they would last a good year or so if I wore them for work(factory). The only issue I have with them is that the laft boot fits perfect, while the right one is snug at the top of my foot/bottom of ankle. Seems like it's loosening up the more I wear it. Makes my foot go numb while I'm just sitting. I have high hope for these boots, wearing the to Sturgis this year...lots of walking and riding!!! Will update when we get back.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Doc Marten Boots are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Doc Martens Boots are awesome. I have had my eye on these for several years and finally decided to get them and I'm so glad that I did. They arrived well before expected. Couldn't be happier. First time I put them in they felt very comfortable. Was able to break them in fast without any blisters on my feet. They are a bit heavy as expected from a steel toed boot. I love Doc Martens and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are breaking in and feel very comfortable. They are durable and well constructed. The leather is free of flaws. This is my second pair of these and I’m as pleased with these as I am with my older ones. Ordering from this buyer was cheaper than in store and shipping was very fast. I really like these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs and this is the only pair I could not even get on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: APPROVE!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is pretty rough on boots....the life of the lumber industry. A good pair usually last him about 6/7 months. These hoots are a softer leather so we will see but so far he says they fit good & feel good, for those qualities he would order again.....well he would have me order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Do not last.
customer_reviews.text: Great feeling boot but does not last very long. I usually go threw 2 pairs of red wings a year but these this not last a month.
customer_reviews.author: Nut Malone

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, solid product. Wish they were available in a wider option. Still has decent space. Product arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkone

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots but the shaft height isnt accurate
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these boots, they came right on time. The only issue we had is that the description for these boots says they have an 11.5inch shaft and they definitely do not, they are not as tall as husband's 10inch boots which are all slouched with wear. These are good looking, comfortable boots but if you need that height then they aren't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney delacruz

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: My husband has only had these for 4 months and he already needs a new pair. He is just a diesel mechanic. To me it seems they would last longer, and they stink to high heaven. I just feel in his line of work he isn't too rough on them and should get more than 4 months out of a pair
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: No slip and slide
customer_reviews.text: I have worked in an extremely oily environment, with that being said the anti slip on these boots are amazing worked here for a few years now and this is the first anti slip shoe I baught that actually works. It fits like a boot so it’s not hugely comfortable but I’m extremely cheap and after using them for a few days I don’t regret spending the money.
customer_reviews.author: troy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Wears these to work. Great shoe for factory work. But will need some support tho because it’s hard on feet of your on them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Decent boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots look very cool but are a little too loose for me around the lower calf area. Too much movement. I wound up going back to my lace up redwings
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Poor work wear
customer_reviews.text: Son has not even had these a year and only wears to work and the soles have came loose on them.... wouldn’t recommend for daily work wear
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to tight but
customer_reviews.text: Zeemed to tight and they really hurt my feet but after about 2 days of wearing them working 8 hour shifts in those 2 days they broke in faster than I thought, i could do without that thick padding on the side but what can you do. But they work great for me as a mechanic
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great boot outstanding comfort right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, always had a problem with steel toes because my small toe would always be jammed up against the edge on these boots there are a wide like the others these are far better they are actually comfortable might have to purchase another pair !!!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Left boot is falling apart and cracking in just 5 month
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these boots for my son previously and the were fantastic and lasted for years. I bought him a new pair in Dec. 2018 and now May 2019 (5 months) the left boot is cracking and the sole is splitting .... I am not satisfied at all!!! The boots are polished on a regular basis. This should not be happening. Right boot is good quality but the LEFT BOOT is Very poor quality. Not satisfied at all !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Starr

customer_reviews.title: Interior boot
customer_reviews.text: Sole came apart from boot within a week. After many tries with this boot, it is built inferior. Last two i bought the inside support broke down, making heel shift inward. Not a well built boot. Only good thing was Dr. Martin always taking care to send a new pair of boots. Only this time i chose to return and get a different brand boot.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: These are some of the most comfortable boots that I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the most comfortable boots that I have ever worn. I work at a theme park in Los Angeles and there are many times for which my toes were crushed by different work factors. However, these steel toed boots have protected my toes very well from these said factors/variables. Make sure you take your time in breaking into these boots and not to just wear them for the first time to your 9-5 job.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy adan

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 4-5 pairs of these before so I didn’t have to worry about the size. I would suggest trying on a pair at a local store to see what size you are. But the price is the same. I purchased online to get the color I wanted. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Miller

customer_reviews.title: Boot openings too small.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair and this pair turned out to be too small at the boot openings. Just putting them on is a chore and after a couple of weeks one of the loops, to pull them on, came off. Now I feel like it's a gamble.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso A. Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good boots.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good boots, but they cut into my leg so I rolled the top part down a little and now they're just fine. My suggestion if you're going to buy these boots, wear knee high socks or roll the top part down a little.
customer_reviews.author: Skulldeath83

customer_reviews.title: No sizes fit
customer_reviews.text: My toes hit the end of the 9 and the 10 is way too loose. I don't know why they don't make half sizes.
customer_reviews.author: OfficeAdmin

customer_reviews.title: bought thorogood boots instead much happier with a usa made
customer_reviews.text: The boot don't last.. tears at the soul of the boot allowing water to get in... bought thorogood boots instead much happier with a usa made boot
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and he loves them! Won’t wear any other boots after owning these.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots. Went up a half size and they fit perfectly. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Raine V

customer_reviews.title: Not slip resistant as described. Quality of the build is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I'll start with these are by far the most comfortable and warm work boot Iv bought in years. But...after 4 months wear the soles are no longer slip resistant. The right boot has developed a stress crack on the inside top, right where the leather bends. I work in a meat room 10 hours a day. The boots are constantly splashed with water and blood. I'm now having to look for more boots because these are slicker than owl $#!+ .
customer_reviews.author: L. Long

customer_reviews.title: Terribly upset. Got these for my husband
customer_reviews.text: Terribly upset. Got these for my husband. Second pair he has owned he used the strap for its intention which is to pull your boot on and it snapped. I don't pay this much for a product to do this. I'm returning them through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: JRC

customer_reviews.title: Order a 1/2 size larger if you can
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot , steel toe , good work boot . make sure you order a size larger . This is the second pare that I bought . the first was to small and hurt my feet .
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Good boots. Long life.
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently on my second pair of these and they’re great boots. First pair lasted three years and these are getting toward the end on their third year of wear now. I plan on buying another pair, hopefully for them to last well into next decade. I’m a paramedic so they need to be easy-on. I went with the wellies because I’ve had bad luck with EMS style boots with zippers. I also average 15,000 steps per day so I definitely put some miles on them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Dr. ordered,..
customer_reviews.text: Just received these bad boys today,..i will be sticking to the Dr. Martens line unto the end of time,..i still have two pair of the 8761 Model circa 2000, time to be resoled or bronzed and get a fresh pair,..my German Tankers are The Number 1 boot with the two aforementioned Docs 2 and 3 followed by my Dan Post Cowboy Boots,..will follow up after working in these beasts,..
customer_reviews.author: GeoCentricPlaneswalker

customer_reviews.title: Second pair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot beat a good pair of work boots!! The last pair of these I purchased were not steel toe and 3 years later I am still wearing them around the house. The steel toe version is a bit stiff and took a while longer to break in. Not the soul part of the shoe being stiff but the upper where the pull tabs are seems a bit tougher to break in. All in all great buy and excellent price!!
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Great work boot!
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. I added inserts, they really help if you’re standing for many hours. Love Doc M’s!
customer_reviews.author: natasilas

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy boots, but hard to break in. Gave me blisters on both feet the first 3 times I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Great for day boots and accepted by my fire department
customer_reviews.author: Casey W. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for heavy duty work.
customer_reviews.text: Dr Martens are some of the most comfortable boots I've ever worn and these are no exception. However, after only owning these for a little over a week, the sole on the right boot did the infamous Dr Marten split to the point of no longer being useful. Two stars because the fit was great and were very comfortable boots. If it weren't for that, it'd be one star. $125 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great boot the only reason I put a little small ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boot the only reason I put a little small was because of the width. I had to go a size bigger for my wide foot to fit comfortably
customer_reviews.author: DG Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality this time but in the past over the last 10 years say durable very comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of this particular boot this time I have in the past ordered the same boot and they were perfect and they lasted this time it fell apart after only a month-and-a-half the boot separated at the seam of the sole.
customer_reviews.author: erik gutleben

customer_reviews.title: Continue to Purchase over and over
customer_reviews.text: My husband Matt has bought this pair of work boots three times now. He loves the way they feel on his feet even after a 12 hour shift on his feet. They are very durable and last him on average 2yrs. He wears them daily. He says they are ugly as sin but wear like a dream. I like that they last a long time and protect his calves and feet from dangerous things.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the leather on these boots. They are very stiff at the current time but are breaking in nicely and have already started to get more comfortable. Very happy with purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my husband to wear to work everyday. They lasted last then 2 months! Yesterday the sole came completely off of the right boot. I had already called the company prior to this because they were not holding up as I expected. The company told me that they would not replace or refund my money. This was considered normal wear and tear!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Steel toe w/a bit of style
customer_reviews.text: These are my husband's second pair of these boots. He wore the first pair out and requested a new pair. His job is primarily an office job, but occasionally has to visit "the field" where steel toes are a requirement, so these fit the bill. These are also his favorite boots to wear when we ride Harley. His first pair lasted years before needing replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Summer K

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, steel toe makes it for a bit more snug.
customer_reviews.text: This boot is very sturdy and overall comfortable. It fits a little tighter than I'd prefer over the top of the foot as a result of the steel toe feature.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Ughhh
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sizes to try them out. The smaller size hurt the top of my foot and I thought with these at the end of the day my feet will swell and hurt even more so I kept the bigger size. Well... They loosened up so bad that I tried putting two extra insoles in them. It didn't help very much and now I can't even wear them. They slip in the heels so I have to drag my feet when I walk and I can't climb the towers. They were great at first. Doc's just have weird sizing so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy again
customer_reviews.text: Semi comfortable but really soft leather. Leather rubbed off on steel toe in less then 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Seth J. Whipple

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for walking and  standing all day
customer_reviews.text: They were a christmas present for my husband who works in construction. He said he loves them! "They are light, durable, comfortable and proven waterproof!" As his wife, i finally found a name i can buy with confidence he will enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Xan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Last for years very comfortable and durable all day wear
customer_reviews.author: mellow

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My husband spent $300 on boots at cavrnders that broke within a month. I bought him these for father's day and he loves them. No problems. Nicely made. Strong.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: For work or riding these are the ones
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable booty I've ever owned and I've owed ALOT OF BOOTS TRUST ME FOR WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri G.

customer_reviews.title: I loved the first pair
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this product.I loved the first pair. For this reason, I bought a second pair. They are used by a family member who is an iron worker. He has to were steel toe boots and these are stylish, affordable, and functional.
customer_reviews.author: SandraW

customer_reviews.title: Was delivered wrong product.
customer_reviews.text: I needed the product now. I ordered one day shipping and it's the wrong pair, right size also still dr martens but a lace up and not a steel toe.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Wider is better.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this boot in a standard width however it was very tight. I reordered in the extra wide and fit perfect. I have never need EW before. Great boot all in all.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: Very tight toe box. No ankle support and crappy made.
customer_reviews.author: OpporTUNAty Sportfishing

customer_reviews.title: Unknown
customer_reviews.text: If you order xwide then the whole boot is loose..the toe space should be the widest for toe room..if you order wide then the purpose of the ankle support is pointless
customer_reviews.author: Keith O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Tired of spending hundreds dollars for boots that only last 2 to 6 months so I ran across these Doc Martens in which I've had other Doc Martens before they've been really comfortable and long-lasting so I figured I'd give it them a try ,so far I'm impressed
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and not comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Solid boot but leather still has not not broke into being as comfortable as my previous pair. Also seeing made in China on the sewn on label kind of takes the thunder out of the Dr. Martens brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Jedi

product_meta.title: Dr. Martens, Men's Icon 2295 Steel Toe Heavy Industry Boots
product_meta.description: The Icon 2295 ST is an iconic Wellington pull-on boot. This industrial boot has a steel toe cap, slip resistant sole and has additional insulation that will help protect the wearer against accidental contact with an electrical charge. Available in an extra-wide, generous fit.
